verses.1: Topa aw, migilote kiang panin kei hong hon khia inla, mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei hong kem in.
verses.2: Amaute in a lung sung uh ah thusia geelgeel uh a, gal phuang ngitnget uh hi.
verses.3: A leii uh gulpi leii bang a, a thugente uh gulgu bang hi.
verses.4: Topa aw, migiloteʼ khut sung panin kei hong cing inla, kei, suk paih ding a hong sawm mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei hong kem in.
verses.5: Mi kiphasakte in keimah hong siahna-in tehlop tung sim uh a, amaute in ngenthang zakin lam gei ah thangzak tawh kei hong siah uh hi.
verses.6: Topaʼ tungah hih bangin ka ci hi: Nang pen keima Pasian na hi hi; ka thumna awte hong ngai in, Topa!
verses.7: Topa, keima Topa, a thahat hong hon khia pa aw, gal kidona sungah keimah nong hu hi.
verses.8: Topa aw, migilo paʼ deihnate tangtungsak kei inla, ama thusia sawmna a maban sotsak kei in!
verses.9: Kei hong umcih mite gualzosak kei inla, kei hong sawmnate uh amauʼ lu tung mah tusak in!
verses.10: Amaute tungah mei-am kuang zusak in. A thokik zo nawn lo dingin dum sungah amaute kiasak in!
verses.11: Mi gensia pa leitungah mavangsak kei inla, mi ngongtat pa pen thusia in sulzuih tahen!
verses.12: Topa in gimna a thuak miteʼ thu a panpihna, mi cimawhte adingin thu a manin a khenna ka thei hi.
verses.13: Thuman mite in nangma min hong phat pelmawh ding uh a, lungsim thutangte pen nangma omna ah teeng ding uh hi.
